entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
